member.summary: New sell orders will be rejected. Orders resulting in a short open position will be red carded.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiMarketInformationDTO.LimitDown
member.summary: New buy orders will be rejected. Orders resulting in a long open position will be red carded.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiMarketInformationDTO.LongPositionOnly
member.summary: Cannot open a short position. Equivalent to limit up.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiMarketInformationDTO.CloseOnly
member.summary: Can only close open positions. Equivalent to both Limit up and Limit down.

member.summary: List of market end of day DTOs.

member.name: T:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Orders.ApiIfDoneDTO
member.summary: Contains the If/Done stop and limit orders. An If/Done order is comprised of two separate orders linked togehter and requested as a single order. When the first order is executed, the second order becomes an active order. For example, attaching a stop/limit to a trade or order.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Orders.ApiIfDoneDTO.Stop
member.summary: The price at which the stop order will be filled.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Orders.ApiIfDoneDTO.Limit
member.summary: The price at which the limit order will be filled.

member.summary: The order status reason identifier.

member.name: T:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO
member.summary: A quote for a specific order request.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.QuoteId
member.summary: The unique ID of the Quote.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.OrderId
member.summary: The ID of the Order that the Quote is related to.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.MarketId
member.summary: The Market the Quote is related to.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.BidPrice
member.summary: The Price of the original Order request for a Buy.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.BidAdjust
member.summary: The amount the bid price will be adjusted to become an order when the customer is buying (BidPrice + BidAdjust = BuyPrice).

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.OfferPrice
member.summary: The Price of the original Order request for a Sell.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.OfferAdjust
member.summary: The amount the offer price will be adjusted to become an order when the customer is selling (OfferPrice + OfferAdjust = OfferPrice).

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.Quantity
member.summary: The Quantity is the number of units for the trade i.e CFD Quantity = Number of CFD's to Buy or Sell , FX Quantity = amount in base currency.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.CurrencyId
member.summary: The system internal ID for the ISO Currency. An API call will be available in the near future to look up the equivalent ISO Code.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.StatusId
member.summary: The Status ID of the Quote. An API call will be available in the near future to look up the Status values.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.TypeId
member.summary: The quote type ID.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.QuoteDTO.RequestDateTime
member.summary: The timestamp the quote was requested. Always expressed in UTC.

member.name: T:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO
member.summary: A Price for a specific Market.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.MarketId
member.summary: The Market that the Price is related to.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.TickDate
member.summary: The date of the Price. Always expressed in UTC.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.Bid
member.summary: The current Bid price (price at which the customer can sell).

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.Offer
member.summary: The current Offer price (price at which the customer can buy, sometimes referred to as Ask price).

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.Price
member.summary: The current mid price.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.High
member.summary: The highest price reached for the day.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.Low
member.summary: The lowest price reached for the day.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.Change
member.summary: The change since the last price (always positive). See Direction for direction of the change.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.Direction
member.summary: The direction of movement since the last price. 1 == up, 0 == down.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.Streaming.PriceDTO.AuditId
member.summary: A unique ID for this price. Treat as a unique, but random string.

member.name: T:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiTradingAccountDTO
member.summary: Information about a Trading Account.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiTradingAccountDTO.TradingAccountId
member.summary: Trading Account ID.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiTradingAccountDTO.TradingAccountCode
member.summary: Trading Account Code.

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiTradingAccountDTO.TradingAccountStatus
member.summary: Trading account status with possible values (Open, Closed).

member.name: P:TradingApi.CoreDTO.ApiTradingAccountDTO.TradingAccountType
member.summary: Trading account type with possible values (Spread, CFD).
